channel.title: Runescape back in the day (Detailed archives.)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/126cv85.jpg[/img] (old rs logo ftw, found on these archives.)
Meh, I was bored and found these.
Runescape beta: http://web.archive.org/web/20010605042500/http://www.jagex.com/runescape.html
Page showing rs features and updates: http://web.archive.org/web/20001110100100/http://www.jagex.com/runescape.html
Runescape homepage: http://web.archive.org/web/20010112175700/http://jagex.com/runescape.html
Newer rs with 4 worlds, client download, homepage: http://web.archive.org/web/20011214022429/http://www.jagex.com/runescape.html [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/1zd7seu.jpg[/img] (On this page you can actually download the client!!)
Top 2000 players overall, old rs highscore.. http://web.archive.org/web/20020203093533/209.120.137.229/hs-0-0.html
The actual highscores: http://web.archive.org/web/20020204060114/www.jagex.com/hiscore.html
Jagex trying to recruit, shows some pics of their old software. (Thanks to Unhandled for the find) http://web.archive.org/web/20001207125800/www.jagex.com/recruit.html
